ProjectsPage.noProjectsDescription: Projects will appear here once they're added to your Sanity CMS.

NewsPage.title: NEWS & INSIGHTS
NewsPage.intro: Stay updated with our latest projects, architectural insights, and industry developments. Discover the stories behind our designs and our vision for the future of architecture.
NewsPage.noArticlesDescription: News articles will appear here once they're added to your Sanity CMS.

AboutPage.title: ABOUT US
AboutPage.intro: We are a team of passionate architects dedicated to creating innovative, sustainable, and timeless designs that enhance the human experience and respect the environment.
AboutPage.philosophyText1: Architecture is more than just building structures; it's about creating spaces that inspire, comfort, and connect people with their environment. We believe in a holistic approach that considers not just the aesthetic and functional aspects of design, but also its impact on sustainability and community.
AboutPage.philosophyText2: Every project we undertake is guided by principles of innovation, environmental responsibility, and timeless design. We strive to create buildings that will stand the test of time, both structurally and aesthetically.
AboutPage.teamText: Our diverse team brings together decades of experience in architectural design, urban planning, and sustainable construction. We collaborate closely with clients, engineers, and contractors to ensure every project exceeds expectations.

ConsultationPage.title: GET CONSULTATION
ConsultationPage.intro: Schedule a consultation with our expert architects to discuss your project, explore design possibilities, and understand how we can bring your vision to life.
ConsultationPage.step1Text: We'll discuss your vision, requirements, and project scope in detail.
ConsultationPage.step2Text: We'll evaluate your site and provide professional recommendations.
ConsultationPage.step3Text: Receive a detailed proposal with timeline, budget, and design approach.

ContactPage.title: CONTACT US
ContactPage.intro: Ready to start your architectural journey? Get in touch with us to discuss your project and discover how we can bring your vision to life.
ContactPage.businessHoursDetails:
Monday - Friday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM
Saturday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM
Sunday: Closed
